title: LF someone who wants to play norms
body:
I'm just a newbie who recently got back into league.
Playing alone is kinda boring and all my friends only play ranked ;-;
So yeah, looking for someone to play with in normals
I have skype / discord if wanted ^~^
pls don't be younger then like 16 lol because i'm 17 and it would be awkward to skype with someone i'd consider a child x.x

replies.body: I'd join ya. I fill all roles but Support and Mid above all else. If there's anything you've forgotten or if there's anything new you can ask me.
